scripts.build: ng build --project serversiderendering --prod && ng run serversiderendering:server && node ./commands/c.js create-catalogs-index
scripts.seeds: node ./commands/c.js sync-orm && node ./commands/c.js create-sections && node ./commands/c.js create-categories && node ./commands/c.js create-links && node ./commands/c.js create-menus && node ./commands/c.js create-journalists && node ./commands/c.js create-authors && node ./commands/c.js create-media-category && node ./commands/c.js create-newspapers && node ./commands/c.js create-episodes && node ./commands/c.js create-articles && node ./commands/c.js create-opus && node ./commands/c.js create-authors-relations
scripts.index-contents: node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 0 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 99 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 199 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 299 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 399 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 499 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 599 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 699 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 799 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-content 899 100
scripts.index-newses: node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 0 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 99 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 199 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 299 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 399 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 499 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 599 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 699 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 799 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 899 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 999 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 1099 100 && node ./commands/c.js index-articles-news 1199 100
